string.name: already_signed_up
string.u: Already signed up? Connect to your account right now !

resources.string: Disruption is an endless mission type tasking the Tenno with recovering items from conduits, asset security systems which Alad V has marketed and sold across the system. Similar to Mobile Defense, the squad must fight high-ranking enemies to loot a conduit key and activate a terminal, then defend it from a Demo unit that tries to destroy that terminal.
Mission rewards are based on the number of conduits successfully defended and the round. It goes as follow :

You can make your runs more efficient by using this
- A :
 -> 1 conduit on each round
 -> extract at the end of the 3rd round
 - B :
 -> round 1 : 4 conduits
 -> round 2 : 3 conduits
 -> round 3 : 2 conduits
 -> round 4+ : 1 conduit
 - C :
 -> round 1 : /
 -> round 2 : /
 -> round 3 : 4 conduits
 -> round 4+ : 3 conduits

Defense is an endless mission type in which the players must defend the assigned primary objective or objectives from being destroyed by attacking waves of enemies. The wave will be considered cleared when all the enemies in the wave have been killed.
Mission rewards change every 5 waves and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.

Survival is an endless mission type where players will have to fight an endless, steady stream of enemies to survive for as long as possible while slowly losing life support, distracting enemies as a Tenno operative secretly gathers supplies behind the scenes.
Mission rewards change every 5 minutes and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.
Spy is a mission type where players are tasked with extracting confidential data from enemy data servers (Data Vaults).

Mission rewards are based on the number of Data Vaults hacked :
- 1/3 Data Vaults : A
- 2/3 Data Vaults : B
- 3/3 Data Vaults : C

Exterminate missions require players to kill a limited number of enemies in the area and then make it to extraction. A counter will be displayed below the minimap showing the number of enemies remaining.
Capture is a mission type requiring the player to find a person of interest, incapacitate them before they escape, and capture said target before heading to extraction.

Mobile Defense is a mission type requiring players to carry a data-mass to 2-3 computer terminals and upload it to them. Once uploaded at each terminal, players will have to defend the terminal until hacking is completed. The mission will fail if a single terminal is destroyed.

Interception is an endless mission type requiring players to capture and hold set locations on the map in order to intercept enemy transmissions by reaching 100% control sooner than the enemy faction does.
Mission rewards change every round and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.
Assault is a mission type identical to Sabotage, requiring Tenno to breach into the Kuva Fortress and destroy its navar cannon.

Sabotage is a mission type requiring players to reach an objective, and then destroy it before heading to extraction. The objective that needs to be destroyed differs depending on the mission\'s tileset.
Rescue is a mission type requiring the player to locate a hostage and escort them to extraction without alerting the base\'s security.
Assassination is a mission type that tasks the Tenno to seek and eliminate a unique enemy boss and then return to extraction.
Rush is a mission type exclusive to Archwing that has players navigate a Corpus Ship within the time limit to destroy up to 3 Corpus transports before they escape.

Mission rewards are based on the number of transports destroyed :
- 1/3 transports : A
- 2/3 transports : B
- 3/3 transports : C
Volatile is a Empyrean mission type where the Tenno recalibrate a Corpus Ship\'s reactor to remove its defenses and allow its destruction from Railjack armaments.
Orphix is an empyrean mission type where Tenno must fight against Sentient Orphix boarding Corpus Ships using Necramechs.
Mission rewards change every 3 destroyed Orphix and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.
Rathuum is a Grineer Arena mission hosted by Kela De Thaym on Sedna which pits Tenno against Kela\'s Executioners to earn the Judgement Points necessary to face Kela herself.
Hijack is a Mission type where players must take control of a large, mobile objective and safely lead it to extraction.
Pursuit is a mission type exclusive to Archwing that has players pursue the enemy\'s ship to disable it and retrieve its Black box.
Defection is an endless mission type that tasks players with escorting small squads of Kavor Defectors to an extraction point while defending against the Infested.
Mission rewards change every 2 escorted squads and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.

Skirmish is the standard empyrean mission in Proxima nodes, requiring players to destroy a limited number of fighters and Crewships in the area, with an occasional third objective to take out an orbital installation like a hangar. Counters will be displayed below the minimap showing the number of enemies remaining.

Arena is a game mode in which players must defeat special enemies in modified Conclave maps until a certain number of opponents has been defeated. Tenno do not need to extract and the mission will only end with their victory or defeat.
Excavation is an endless mission type that tasks players with searching and then extracting various artifacts buried deep within a planet\'s surface. This mission is the primary source of Cryotic.
Mission rewards change every 200 unearthed Cryotics (100 per excavator fully done) and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.
Infested Salvage is an endless mission type that tasks players with retrieving a shipping manifest from an Infested Ship.
Mission rewards change every decrypted console and follows a repeating rotation A-A-B-C pattern.
